column4: Can someone educate me a bit on creation of a safe-enough but not annoyingly complex or long passphrase for GPG?
use 8 to 12 characters, include upper characters and at least 2 special characters (#_, etc.)
and don't use anything that can be found (either directly or by combination) in a dictionary
often, people use initial letters of sentences, like "I love to go out for a walk with my dog" turns to "Il2gOfaWwmD0g"
this is already a somewhat bloated example, but you get the point
yup :) Now i've read suggestions not to make notes in my PC - I feel using gedit is reasonably safe, if I don't save it, isn't it?
if you don't save at all, it should be sufficiently safe
for permanent storage, I suggest encryption
And is there a good place to test passwords?
I guess there are websites and places like that where you can test passwords...
but I(!) wouldn't use any password I've entered cleartextly into a website or something
just follow my tips and maybe look for further on the web and you'll be fine
